statements: SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, parent_name FROM students WHERE age >= 18 AND parent_contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_id, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level ASC, student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, parent_contact FROM students WHERE age < 15 ORDER BY age, student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level < 12 ORDER BY grade_level ASC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, parent_name FROM students WHERE parent_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com' OR parent_contact LIKE '%@yahoo.com';
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 15 AND 17 ORDER BY age DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, parent_name, parent_contact FROM students WHERE parent_name IS NOT NULL AND parent_contact IS NOT NULL ORDER BY parent_name ASC, parent_contact ASC, student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 18;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, subject, grade FROM StudentProgress WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level='High School' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE age >= 18 AND age <= 22;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id WHERE StudentProgress.subject='Math';
SELECT SUM(grade) AS total_grade FROM StudentProgress WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM Students WHERE age < 15 ORDER BY student_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY grade_level;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percentage < 80;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, course_name FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id JOIN courses ON student_progress.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id WHERE progress_percentage > 50;

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id JOIN courses ON student_progress.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT teacher_name, course_name, credit_hours FROM courses ORDER BY credit_hours DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level = 9;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE teacher_name = 'Mr. Smith';
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM students INNER JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date, attended FROM students INNER JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance_date = '2022-07-15' AND attended = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, subject_name, progress_status FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id JOIN subjects ON student_progress.subject_id = subjects.subject_id;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, teacher_name FROM students JOIN teachers ON students.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT student_name, subjects.subject_name FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id JOIN subjects ON student_progress.subject_id = subjects.subject_id WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';

SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING attendance_count > 10 ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;

SELECT student_name, teacher_name, progress_status FROM students JOIN teachers ON students.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id LEFT JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id WHERE progress_status IS NULL;
